title: Linisha | Portfolio
text:
— HELLO


I’m LinishaWeb Developer


Web Developer crafting modern, responsive, and visually compelling websites. Specializing in clean code, smooth user experiences, and digital solutions that bring ideas to life and drive results.


Let’s Talk Learn More












— ABOUT



I’m a passionate Web Developer


I’m a passionate Web Developer who loves building modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites. With a strong focus on clean code and creative design, I enjoy turning ideas into interactive digital experiences that work seamlessly across all devices.


 Twitter  GitHub








— SERVICES


What I Provide


I will develop designs that appeal to your desired clients while effectively communicating your message. You can acquire professionally made graphics and persuasive collateral that can be utilized in almost any application by using our graphic design and development services.







Frontend Development


Building responsive, modern, and interactive user interfaces using the latest technologies.







Backend Development


Creating secure and scalable server-side applications with efficient API integration.







Database Management


Designing and maintaining optimized databases for reliable and fast data access.










— SKILLS


I Develop Skills Regularly To Keep Me Update


I take my time to learn new technologies and stay up-to-date with the latest tools in web development. I focus on clean code, performance, and design consistency.



Building responsive interfaces using React & Tailwind CSS.


Writing scalable backend APIs with Node.js & MongoDB.


Following latest JavaScript & CSS trends.


Delivering optimized full-stack web applications.


Download CV






























— PROJECTS


My Projects




Restaurant Website


A fully responsive restaurant website with an online menu, booking system, chef profiles, customer feedback, and integration with social media for promotions.




NCC Agro Industries Website


An informational and service-based site for an agro-industries company. Includes service descriptions, product catalog, team profiles, news updates, and a contact form for inquiries.




Tech Blog Platform


A dynamic blog platform for tech enthusiasts with categories, comment sections, syntax highlighting for code snippets, and responsive design for all devices.




Portfolio Showcase


A personal portfolio website featuring a gallery of works, interactive project previews, skill sections, and a downloadable resume for clients and recruiters.




E-commerce Store


A fully functional online store with product listings, shopping cart, payment gateway integration, order tracking, and customer reviews.




Mobile App Landing Page


A sleek landing page for a mobile app including feature highlights, download links, video demo, testimonials, and a subscription form for updates.









Let’s Work Together


I take my time, I don’t force things I just feel and absorb emotions that are floating around. I capture moments as they come.



Your Name 


Your Email 


Write your message



Send Message

title: My Projects
text:
My Projects


Restaurant Website
A fully responsive restaurant website with an online menu, booking system, chef profiles, customer feedback, and integration with social media for promotions.


NCC Agro Industries Website
An informational and service-based site for an agro-industries company. Includes service descriptions, product catalog, team profiles, news updates, and a contact form for inquiries.


Tech Blog Platform
A dynamic blog platform for tech enthusiasts with categories, comment sections, syntax highlighting for code snippets, and responsive design for all devices.


Portfolio Showcase
A personal portfolio website featuring a gallery of works, interactive project previews, skill sections, and a downloadable resume for clients and recruiters.


E-commerce Store
A fully functional online store with product listings, shopping cart, payment gateway integration, order tracking, and customer reviews.


Mobile App Landing Page
A sleek landing page for a mobile app including feature highlights, download links, video demo, testimonials, and a subscription form for updates.


Online Learning Platform
A learning management system with course catalog, quizzes, progress tracking, video lectures, and user dashboards for students and teachers.


NGO Awareness Website
An informational site for an NGO with mission statements, donation integration, volunteer signup forms, news updates, and event calendars.
